repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:22.04

RUN apt-get update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get --no-install-recommends install -y \
    locales && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN sed -i -e 's/# en_US.UTF-8 UTF-8/en_US.UTF-8 UTF-8/' /etc/locale.gen && \
    dpkg-reconfigure --frontend=noninteractive locales && \
    update-locale LANG=en_US.UTF-8
ENV LANG en_US.UTF-8

RUN DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get --no-install-recommends install -y \
    curl && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

WORKDIR /tmp
RUN curl -f -O https://cran.r-project.org/src/base/R-4/R-4.1.2.tar.gz && \
    tar xf R-4.1.2.tar.gz && \
    rm R-4.1.2.tar.gz

RUN DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get --no-install-recommends install -y \
    build-essential \
    gfortran \
    libcurl4-nss-dev \
    libxml2-dev \
    libreadline-dev \
    libbz2-dev \
    liblzma-dev \
    libpng-dev \
    liblapack-dev \
    libcairo2-dev \
    libfreetype6-dev \
    libpng-dev \
    libtiff5-dev \
    libjpeg-dev \
    libharfbuzz-dev \
    libfribidi-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

WORKDIR /tmp/R-4.1.2
RUN ./configure --build="$(dpkg-architecture --query DEB_BUILD_GNU_TYPE)" \
    --enable-R-shlib \
    --with-x=no \
    --disable-BLAS-shlib && \
        make && \
        make install

RUN mkdir -p /tmp/source/jmv/build/R4.1.2-linux

RUN DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get --no-install-recommends install -y \
    libprotoc-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

COPY docker/install-packages.py .

COPY docker/base-deps-sources.json .
RUN python3 install-packages.py base-deps-sources.json /usr/local/lib/R/library

COPY docker/jmv-deps-sources.json .
RUN python3 install-packages.py jmv-deps-sources.json /tmp/source/jmv/build/R4.1.2-linux
RUN rm -rf /tmp/source/jmv/build/R4.1.2-linux/BH /tmp/source/jmv/build/R4.1.2-linux/StanHeaders
